name: mygirlbetty
message:
This is so good Josh! Your style is really nice, and the tone is perfect and it really is very interesting. I think more info is needed, as in, who decided to implant and what was the reason etc but that can come out more. Oh, if you'd thought of continuing it. but you should. Fascinating topics aren't always pleasant. Look at American Psycho. 
But for reals, keep writing. I dig it.
